issue.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [x] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

<https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/193723>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->
It seems there is an issue with a specific filter, so I have temporarily disabled it. Aside from https://yutura.net/channel/51388/, the same issue occurs on https://picrew.me/en/ and http://jin115.com/.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/193723#issuecomment-2507156679


### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

issue.title: AdGuard-DNS is breaking Payoneer app.
issue.body:
### Platform

Android

### Protocol

DNS-over-HTTPS

### Do you use AdGuard app?

No I don't

### Your configuration

1. OpenWrt 23.05.5 with Adguard private DNS over HTTPS (forced all devices connected to the router will have to use AdGuard-DNS) e.g. https://d.adguard-dns.com/dns-query/<unique-id>
2. Android 14

### Traceroute to AdGuard DNS

_No response_

### Issue Details

1. Set Adguard Private DNS over HTTPS on OpenWRT
2. Install [Payoneer](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.payoneer.android) app
3. Launch the app

### Expected Behavior

The app should open and show the log in form.

### Actual Behavior

The never shows anything other than welcome animation loop. It is only happening when using Adguard-DNS and working seamlessly with other DNS and VPN.

### Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![ScreeenShot](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6c343bf3-879f-451c-bcee-b5c789f49b0e)
</details>

### Additional Information

_No response_

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

I have spot two issues here. First with `AdGuard DNS` the widget not load because of filter `||cpdsrv.de^` -> t.cpdsrv.de gets blocked and prevent loading widget. But it's not only the blocked DNS, it is also the way of Cookie Pop-up solution. So after unblocking `cpdsrv.de` when you press "Alle Akzeptieren", the widget is still blocked. You need to press "Einstellungen" and "Auswahl Speichern" (this does not simply accept all trackers), the widget will load. Your current solution Accept all. A video will follow. Maybe you can find a solution here. > 3: Ad placeholder > 4: Outbrain Ad placeholder > 5-6: Ad placeholder on iPhone (screenshot shows 2 of 4 examples) Username: `@Morku` ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.noz.de/lebenswelten/geld-verbraucher/artikel/vermehrt-unbekannte-anrufe-aus-dem-ausland-wie-geht-man-damit-um-47947718](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.noz.de%2Flebenswelten%2Fgeld-verbraucher%2Fartikel%2Fvermehrt-unbekannte-anrufe-aus-dem-ausland-wie-geht-man-damit-um-47947718) ### Comment > 1-2: The read article on widget not load. I have spot two issues here. First with `AdGuard DNS` the widget not load because of filter `||cpdsrv.de^` -> t.cpdsrv.de gets blocked and prevent loading widget. But it's not only the blocked DNS, it is also the way of Cookie Pop-up solution. So after unblocking `cpdsrv.de` when you press "Alle Akzeptieren", the widget is still blocked. You need to press "Einstellungen" and "Auswahl Speichern" (this does not simply accept all trackers), the widget will load. Your current solution Accept all. A video will follow. comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~90 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.noz.de/lebenswelten/geld-verbraucher/artikel/vermehrt-unbekannte-anrufe-aus-dem-ausland-wie-geht-man-damit-um-47947718](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.noz.de%2Flebenswelten%2Fgeld-verbraucher%2Fartikel%2Fvermehrt-unbekannte-anrufe-aus-dem-ausland-wie-geht-man-damit-um-47947718) ### Comment > 1-2: The read article on widget not load. I have spot two issues here. First with `AdGuard DNS` the widget not load because of filter `||cpdsrv.de^` -> t.cpdsrv.de gets blocked and prevent loading widget. But it's not only the blocked DNS, it is also the way of Cookie Pop-up solution. So after unblocking `cpdsrv.de` when you press "Alle Akzeptieren", the widget is still blocked. You need to press "Einstellungen" and "Auswahl Speichern" (this does not simply accept all trackers), the widget will load. Your current solution Accept all. A video will follow. Maybe you can find a solution here. > 3: Ad placeholder > 4: Outbrain Ad placeholder > 5-6: Ad placeholder on iPhone (screenshot shows 2 of 4 examples) Username: `@Morku` ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.noz.de/lebenswelten/geld-verbraucher/artikel/vermehrt-unbekannte-anrufe-aus-dem-ausland-wie-geht-man-damit-um-47947718](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.noz.de%2Flebenswelten%2Fgeld-verbraucher%2Fartikel%2Fvermehrt-unbekannte-anrufe-aus-dem-ausland-wie-geht-man-damit-um-47947718) ### Comment > 1-2: The read article on widget not load. I have spot two issues here. First with `AdGuard DNS` the widget not load because of filter `||cpdsrv.de^` -> t.cpdsrv.de gets blocked and prevent loading widget. But it's not only the blocked DNS, it is also the way of Cookie Pop-up solution. So after unblocking `cpdsrv.de` when you press "Alle Akzeptieren", the widget is still blocked. You need to press "Einstellungen" and "Auswahl Speichern" (this does not simply accept all trackers), the widget will load. Your current solution Accept all. A video will follow. Maybe you can find a solution here. > 3: Ad placeholder > 4: Outbrain Ad placeholder > 5-6: Ad placeholder on iPhone (screenshot shows 2 of 4 examples) Username: `@Morku` ### Screenshots
